about_the_game:
About the game

You simply click a Broccoli, which drops you a common Broccoli
you will recieve a following broccoli every 3 hours:

- 50% Normal
- 40% Common
- 10% Rare
- 1/4 000 000 Mythical
- 1/6 000 000 Legendary
* Can change in the future

Features

Broccoli, duh?
Your broccoli saves if you close the game
Items to collect, grow your collection
Achievements
A community that loves broccoli!

Yeah! Every Broccoli was designed by one of you guys in the community discord! Join our discord and have fun!

name: Broccoli

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Broccoli is a clicker game, in this clicker game, you can click a Broccoli! When you click the Broccoli, you gain even more Broccoli! Every 3 hours you get dropped a broccoli! Every Broccoli is made by the community in the discord, come join us and lets make a great community, together!
